name: Sumanto Dutta
content: Sumanto Dutta – School of Computer Applications Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Sumanto Dutta Sumanto Dutta Sumanto Dutta Assistant ProfessorSumanto Dutta is an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Applications, KIIT University. Before joining KIIT University in December 2023, he was a PhD research scholar with the National Institute of Technology Rourkela. He did his MTech in Computer Science from the National Institute of Technology, Rourkela, Odisha, India, in 2019. He has a total of 4.3 years of teaching experience. He has been an assistant professor at the Institute of Industrial and Computer Management and Research and Maharashtra Institute of Technology - School of Management in Pune, India. His main research interests are Spatiotemporal Data Analysis, Data Mining, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence.
